title: SuShih Tien Dee
description: 素食天地 is the restaurant name in Chinese, address 臺北市大安區和平東路一段182號. Taipei vegan restaurant. Typical Taiwanese vegetarian buffet that weighs food before you pay. Fried rice is available in the buffet, you can also purchase bowls of brown or white rice. A la carte meals start from 100 NT / buffet is by weight. Basic set up. Some items like their mayo and mock meats might not be vegan.
streetAddress: 182, Sec. 1, Heping East Road, Da-an District
